archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0876
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to access and report on ALL billed customer information so that we can ensure that all customers have the correct access fee and are being billed correctly for any additional bundle, services or products they have been subscribed too.

properties.value: The rated cdr's hourly and daily revenue feed will be sufficient. (The Revenue feed will need to contain all customer purchase and payments and adjustments. It will contain the details of the products and bundles added to the customer account and the payment received basically any activity that could generate revenue or add product or service or bundle, or a credit or debit etc.)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
